docTitle.titlePart:
Über einige präparative Probleme zum Hexaehloro-
technetat und ihren Einfluß auf die Messung der
Zerfallskonstanten des **mTc in Hexahalogeno-
komplexen

titlePage.byline:
Zentralinstitut für Isotopen- u. Strahlenforschung der
Akademie der Wissenschaften der DDR, Leipzig

front.note: About some preparative problems concerning hexachloro - technetate and their influence on the measuring of the decay constant of 99m Tc in hexahalogeno complexes
front.div:
A discrepancy between theoretical and experimental
values concerning the variation of decay constant of Mm Tc
is cleared up. A new preparation of hexachlorotechnetate
complex by reduction of pertechnetate ion with hydrazine
ia given. The corrected experimental results are
A(Tc0 4- )- A(TcCl 6 — ) = ( 1,93 ± 0,12 ) * 10"» A,
A(Tc0 4 " " )- *(TcBr 6 — ) = ( 2,44 ± 0,30 ) * 10"3^,
A(Tc0 4- )- A(TcJ 6 — ) = ( 3,22 ± 0,29 ) * 10~3 X.
